body_html:
I have an additional observation that might help us debug this issue. The slowdown for me happens when my cache memory gets full. I tried clearing the cache using:

$ sync && sudo echo 3 > /proc/sys/vm/drop_caches

The training then runs perfectly until the cache gets ~3/4 full again (as seen by the yellow bars on htop), and then it gets slow. So far my solution is to clear cache (requires sudo though) and the training gets fast again. Hoping there's a better way to fix this!

body:
I have an additional observation that might help us debug this issue. The slowdown for me happens when my cache memory gets full. I tried clearing the cache using:

``` bash
$ sync && sudo echo 3 > /proc/sys/vm/drop_caches
```

The training then runs perfectly until the cache gets ~3/4 full again (as seen by the yellow bars on `htop`), and then it gets slow. So far my solution is to clear cache (requires `sudo` though) and the training gets fast again. Hoping there's a better way to fix this!
